product_name: Theo Chocolate Eastern Congo Initiative Coffee and Cream Milk Chocolate Bar
long_description: Grown in eastern Congo by organic farmers focused on quality and sustainability, the ingredients in this chocolate bar indicate a brighter future in an area historically synonymous with suffering.
short_description: Grown in eastern Congo by organic farmers focused on quality and sustainability, the ingredients in this chocolate bar indicate a brighter future in an area historically synonymous with suffering.
